landing.title: DeSports Network
landing.description:
Decentralizing the eSports through an sustainable P2P ecosystem. 
Create custom events, compete, earn rewards and NFTs without any third-party involvement by using $DESP.

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics and Distributions
tokenomics.description: $DESP a deflationary token launched on July 4th 2021, running on the BSC Network. DeSports Network is a vast, long-term project requiring significant development, marketing, and operations. Every transaction will consist of a 10% fee, which will be applied in the following manner:

list.title: 4% Automatic liquidity pool
list.description: Locked until the year 8888. This fee for liquidity will go to an address that the contract creates, and the contract will sell it and add to liquidity automatically.

list.title: 1% Competition Rewards
list.description: Locked until the year 8888. This fee for liquidity will go to an address that the contract creates, and the contract will sell it and add to liquidity automatically.

list.title: 1% Redistributed to the ecosystem
list.description: Locked until the year 8888. This fee for liquidity will go to an address that the contract creates, and the contract will sell it and add to liquidity automatically.

list.title: 2% Foundation and decentralized platform development
list.description: Locked until the year 8888. This fee for liquidity will go to an address that the contract creates, and the contract will sell it and add to liquidity automatically.

list.title: 2% Marketing, Operations and eSports financing
list.description: Locked until the year 8888. This fee for liquidity will go to an address that the contract creates, and the contract will sell it and add to liquidity automatically.

list.title: 25% Manual buybacks(?)
list.description: Locked until the year 8888. This fee for liquidity will go to an address that the contract creates, and the contract will sell it and add to liquidity automatically.

features.title: Platform Features and Token Utility
features.description:
The aim behind DeSports Network token is to create a peer-to-peer sustainable ecosystem that is going to entertain and benefit both the creators and the fans; professionals and amateurs. 
Everyone has a chance to be part of it.

list.title: New Era of Gaming Prize Pools
list.description: DeSports Network will create a system for players to be justly rewarded for the liquidity they provide, in a competitive decentralized platform.

list.title: Tournaments, showmatches and custom events
